comments.raw_text:
The end-users who query bugzilla.mozilla.org must be EXPLICITLY informed that "Description" is actually "Comment 0".  I have been such an end-user for years and did not know that until this past week.  

Either change the "Description" in the display of a bug report to "Description (Comment 0)" or else change "Comment" in the pull-down list of fields for Advanced Search to be "Description/Comment".
